h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: If you see them perform a hand gesture, expect them to disappear, only to reappear from a different angle to try and kick you without warning.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm'.
The content is as follows:
If you see them perform a hand gesture, expect them to disappear, only to reappear from a different angle to try and kick you without warning.
